record.dc:title: 87Ms32 McKee Island Site, Marshall County, Alabama. Associated artifacts from Burial #27.
record.dc:creator: Archer; Battle
record.wpa:narrative: Associated artifacts from Burial #27. Upper center, F.S. #60 (glass trade beads). Second row, left ro right; F.S. #41 (copper ear spangles and piece of tree bark) and F.S. #57 (copper ear plug). Lower left corner; F.S. #42 (copper spangles on ulna fragment). Center F.S. #42 (copper spangles on ulna and humerus fragments). Lower right corner; F.S. #38 (copper band on radius and ulna fragments).
